help:
Available commands are:
 email, cv, github, linkedin, twitter, hobbies, skills, education, experience, projects, interests, languages, awards, contact, help
hobbies: Video games (my all time favorites are Elden Ring and L.A. Noire), listening to music (Jazz & Rock especially), movies and sometimes reading books.
skills:
- Backend development (PHP Laravel, NodeJS, and always open to use new technologies),
- Distributed Systems design
-  and some frontend development mostly using ReactJS.
education: Currently studying Computer Science at the German University in Cairo.
experience:
- I have interned at Microsoft as a Site Reliability Engineering intern.
- I have been working as a part-time Backend Developer at a startup called Robusta Studio for more than a year now.
projects:
I have worked on many projects at Robusta Studio,
 and a few school projects such as a web application for an online learning platform,
 github repo: https://github.com/Advanced-Computer-Lab-2022/Linear-Depression
interests: I am interested in backend development, distributed systems, solving challenging problems, and also some frontend development for fun.
awards:
- Ranked among the top 20 students in Egypt in Thanaweya Amma 2019.
 - Awared partial scholarship for excellence from the German University in Cairo.
